meanings.definition: To change continually; shift back and forth
meanings.sent1: Her mood fluctuates throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: The temperature fluctuates between hot and cold in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The cat's interest in the toy fluctuates depending on the time of day.
meanings.sent4: The stock market fluctuates like a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent5: The waves of the ocean fluctuate in height, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.sent1: His weight fluctuates due to his inconsistent eating habits.
meanings.sent2: The prices of fruits fluctuate seasonally at the market.
meanings.sent3: The car's speed fluctuates as if it has a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels fluctuate like a flickering light bulb.
meanings.sent5: The confidence of the team fluctuates depending on the outcome of the game.
